code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{matchTaobaoProduct}from'../utils/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaobaoMatch(){const[imageUrl,setImageUrl]=useState('');const[matchResult,setMatchResult]=useState(null);const handleMatch=async()=>{try{const result=await matchTaobaoProduct(imageUrl);setMatchResult(result);}catch(error){console.error('타오바오 매칭 실패:',error);alert('타오바오 매칭에 실패했습니다.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"taobao-match",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD0C0\uC624\uBC14\uC624 \uB9E4\uCE6D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"match-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:imageUrl,onChange:e=>setImageUrl(e.target.value),placeholder:"\uC774\uBBF8\uC9C0 URL \uC785\uB825"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleMatch,children:"\uB9E4\uCE6D"})]}),matchResult&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"match-result",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uB9E4\uCE6D \uACB0\uACFC:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uC0C1\uD488\uBA85: ",matchResult.title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uAC00\uACA9: ",matchResult.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uC0C1\uC810\uBA85: ",matchResult.shopName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:matchResult.mainImageUrl,alt:"\uB9E4\uCE6D\uB41C \uC0C1\uD488",width:"200"})]})]});}export default TaobaoMatch;
